title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs
author: Mario Pietsch
name: Link to Tabs
description: Internal links are added to tabs if selected
readme:
This plugin adds a little link icon to every tab. !! Settings * Have a closer look at the "settings-tab" here or * Open the ''$:/ControlPanel -> Settings -> WikiLabs'' tab ''Important:'' This plugin modifies a core module and templates
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] ">
